channel.title: Event on PlaceOS
channel.description: Recent content in Event on PlaceOS

item.title: ASHRAE Headquarters - Net-Zero Retrofit
item.description: ASHRAE is a global society advancing human well-being through sustainable technology for the built environment. ASHRAE is an industry leader and is dedicated to promoting a healthy and sustainable built environment being the creator of BACnet, a protocol and set of standards for the HVAC industry.

item.title: Government Agency - Multi-Tenancy: Space as a Service
item.description: This Government Agency required a multifunctional and scalable workspace management system to serve various federal agencies. It must accurately authenticate users to manage and charge for space utilization, and provide a scalable model suitable for other government spaces facing underutilization.

item.title: NSW Health - Integrated Online Health Consultations
item.description: Gives clinicians, carers, and patients one system to manage consults, surveys, referrals, Medicare billing, education, and follow-ups — no plugins or patchwork tools.

item.title: Building & Region-Level Workplace Management
item.description: Control workplace settings to standardize policies across buildings, so you can scale workplace management while ensuring the right settings for each location.

item.title: Room Booking Updates: Recurring Booking & Room Manager
item.description: Learn about the new recurring bookings feature in our room booking app. Streamline your scheduling process and enhance room management with ease.

item.title: December 2024 PlaceOS Product Updates
item.description: December 2024 WorkMate updates include new parking utilization reports, kiosk customizations, recurring desk bookings, added language support and room alerts.

item.title: API Keys: Simplify Authentication for Apps & Devices
item.description: Simplify app integration with PlaceOS API Keys. Enable secure, authenticated server-to-server interactions, unattended panel access, and auto-login.

item.title: How to Choose the Best Meeting Room Booking Software
item.description: Learn how to select the best meeting room booking software. Explore common challenges, scalability concerns & the unique benefits of PlaceOS.

item.title: September 2024 PlaceOS Product Updates
item.description: New WorkMate features: email templates, parking management, QR code printing, room alerts, and a media library in our September release.

item.title: LIVE DEMO: AI Room Control
item.description: Book, cancel, and control meeting rooms effortlessly with simple prompts. Explore ChromeOS, AOPEN touch panels, and digital signage in our demo event. Join now!

item.title: Introducing Event Manager
item.description: Introducing the Workplace Event Manager, your solution for seamless event planning and management. Optimize workplace events with our innovative tool.

item.title: LIVE DEMO: Concierge - Managing Workplace Experience
item.description: Elevate your hybrid workplace with our advanced workplace management app. Discover how to enhance the workplace experience and streamline operations.

item.title: LIVE EVENT: Rethinking Campus Experience
item.description: Discover smart campus solutions to enhance the campus experience. Learn how a campus app can streamline operations and improve student engagement.

item.title: Managing Technology Redundancy in IoT and Smart Buildings
item.description: Learn how to effectively deal with technology redundancy in IoT and smart buildings. Discover strategies to optimize systems and ensure continuous performance.

item.title: Processing on the 'Edge'
item.description: Explore how edge processing transforms data handling and performance. See why processing on the edge is crucial for real-time analytics and faster decision-maki

item.title: June 2024 PlaceOS Product Updates
item.description: Print concierge reports, refactored tables, authenticated user lists, support request types, map view POI creation, bug fixes.

item.title: LIVE DEMO: Event Manager
item.description: The office is there to support in-person connection, collaboration & productivity. The next live demo is all about that.

item.title: Four technology integrations to help during covid-19
item.description: Right now, it’s hard to focus on any workplace user requirement unless we address the biggest challenge: COVID-19.

item.title: LIVE DEMO: Enhanced Room Booking & Event Manager
item.description: Our latest webinar will be introducing some highly requested updates to our room booking experience & event manager

item.title: LIVE DEMO: Understanding Energy Analytics, Surveys & Catering
item.description: A live demo about technical details behind our energy analytics tools, valuable insights from surveys & our catering tool.

item.title: LIVE DEMO: Visitor Management & Locker Booking
item.description: Looking to streamline your workplace’s visitor management workflows and enhance the visitor experience?

item.title: Office space utilization is only half the story
item.description: It’s easy to guess what most workplaces think they need in terms of data. Here’s what they actually need.

item.title: Office Space Utilization: The Roadmap to Efficiency
item.description: Discover the significance of office space utilization. Dive into key metrics, benefits, and the future of office efficiency.

item.title: Raw crystal 2020 ft Stephen Von Takach
item.description: Raw Crystal 2020 is the last opportunity of the year to connect, share experiences, and learn about Crystal Programming.

item.title: The most neglected smarting building UX
item.description: I’ll give you a hint, it’s UX that involves inviting guests to your building for a meeting or sales pitch.

item.title: User input equals error: the Elon Musk approach
item.description: Tesla takes the approach, all user input equals error. There’s a lot we can learn from that when we apply that ethos.
